ip_description: IP address of innoxel master, i.e. 192.168.0.10
port_description: Port of innoxel master web interface, default 5001
intervals_details: Innoxel Master needs to be polled periodically to have states updated in the adapter. Here you can specify the intervals in seconds in which certain data is updated. Setting an interval to 0 disabled polling of this data.
intervalDeviceStatus_description: Requires an user account with admin privileges
